nodes.bodyText:
Other entries in this changelog use "Firestore now recovers more quickly" (i.e. without "connectivity").
You might also consider rephrasing to avoid "Firestore now recovers ... where Firestore". Something like:

Firestore now recovers more quickly once connections suffering packet loss return to normal.

... or something like that.
